page.title: 08Industry in N/Ham/Coll P
page.content: Most of the industry in the North Hammersmith and College Park area is connected with television and the media. The British Broadcasting Company (B.B.C)employ a large amount of people and most of the industry in the Industrial Estates is involved with television,mainly for making scenery. Industry in the north-west of the area is also connected with steel and metal works. This is then transported along the canal. The railway, the underground railway and the bus routes also provide a large proportion of the industry in the area,especially at the railway depot and bus terminus. Industry on the whole has declined over the past few years as many factories hav moved to cheaper areas or closed down entirely.
